title: Settings in Russian tranlation not saved
author: Apollon-Theos
body_snippet:
With Russian translations all options not saved. After switch to English translation all options is "by default" and must be set again.

## Expected Behavior
All option can be set with any translation of interface and save with any translation.
Option of program must be independent from language.

## Current Behavior
Options set in Russian translation not saved and in English translation must be set again.

## Possible Solution
use English by default translation,  and make independence...
